text:
How does POIFS deal with Chinese Characters.I have a file with Simplified 
Chinese characters but it is not read using POIFS.Can I give a encoding scheme 
while creating POIFS stream?
creator: sukeshprabhakar@rediffmail.com
avik@apache.org
text:
This is hardly a bug report. What do you mean by "not read"? Please ask
questions ont the mailing lists. Bug reports without example sheets and minimum
java code to replicate the problem are impossible to fix.
